title: Compare liberalism to conservatism early 19th c

content.question:
Directions: The suggested planning and writing time for the question below is 35 minutes. Make sure that you are best prepared to answer the question thoroughly in the time permitted. You should spend 5 minutes organizing or outlining your answer. In writing your essay, use specific examples to support your answer.

Compare and contrast political liberalism with political conservatism in the first half of the nineteenth century in Europe.

topic.text: 6.5: The Concert of Europe and European Conservatism

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
